title: WARN message spam "received invalid reject" during torrent download
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: v2.42.0-dirty git_commit=beb97784d43ece5acde365a74efe8763692ebdba
OS & Version: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS x64
Chain/Network: Mainnet

#### Expected behaviour
No Warnings during sync

#### Actual behaviour
I deleted my "chaindata" folder to start a resync and now I got a repeting warning:
````
[WARN] [04-17|19:17:05.116] *torrent.PeerConn 0xc0fe87a000 [id="-GT0003-=\x9d95*6\xa1\v\a\xce\xe6\x91", exts=0000000000100005, v="erigon: 2.40.1-stable-94b4cee5"]: received invalid reject [request={1258 {1736704 16384}}, peer=*torrent.PeerConn 0xc0fe87a000 [id="-GT0003-=\x9d95*6\xa1\v\a\xce\xe6\x91", exts=0000000000100005, v="erigon: 2.40.1-stable-94b4cee5"]]

[WARN] [04-17|19:17:09.581] *torrent.PeerConn 0xc10c2ae000 [id="-GT0003-\xfb\xda\xe8Z\x1bo\xaa\x19\n\t\xb5\xf4", exts=0000000000100005, v="erigon: 2.42.0-stable-beb97784"]: received invalid reject [request={1272 {1966080 16384}}, peer=*torrent.PeerConn 0xc10c2ae000 [id="-GT0003-\xfb\xda\xe8Z\x1bo\xaa\x19\n\t\xb5\xf4", exts=0000000000100005, v="erigon: 2.42.0-stable-beb97784"]]
````

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Delete "chaindata" and restart

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````
Can confirm I'm also experiencing this.
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
